description:
Big mountain days and tough weather are no match for the Helix Bib Pants. These full coverage bibs are versatile and adaptable enough to take you from the first powder of the season through to spring hero snow. The 3-layer waterproof-breathable construction maximizes your time in the snow so when everyone else is ready to call it a day you'll still be keen for more. Inside, a brushed-tricot lining manages moisture and glides smoothly over underlayers. External thigh vents let you regulate your climate on the uptracks, and articulated knees and a gusseted crotch provide unlimited mobility for big air shows.

  • Durable Taslan 3L nylon fabric is highly water-resistant, breathable, and eco-friendly
  • Fully seam-taped construction keeps you dry in howling conditions
  • Right vent with double zipper extends to the top of the bib for side entry
  • Adjustable suspenders fine tune the fit
  • Gusseted crotch, articulated knees and patterning ensure unrestricted movement
  • Side vents let you dump heat on the skin track
  • Two zippered thigh pockets and secure chest pocket for essentials
  • Internal gaiters keep snow out
  • Reinforced kick patches protect against damage from boots, crampons and ski edges
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate it under snow
name: MEC Helix Bib Pants - Men's
